fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Move over to another player. This prevents your second ability for the night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You start over nobody at the start of the game.
- If a non-Astral attacking role visits a player you are currently over. You will roleblock them as well as crush them with an Unstoppable Attack.
- You can only crush one player at a time. Choosing a random player in the case of multiple attackers.
- After crushing a player, you take one night to recharge. You may move over during this period.
